author: Anonymous Mouse
title: Lecture 23 Recording
question:
Hello,
I am in isolation and unable to attend lecture. I wanted to watch the previous year's lecture #23, but the link is giving an error 404. Is there any way to fix this or watch a recording from this year? Thanks!
student_answer: I'm pretty sure you have to wait until the in-person lecture 23 takes place (it hasn't yet)
